title: Urban Ghost Story (1998 - Scotland, UK) horror
description:
Urban Ghost Story (1998 - UK)

Drama / Horror
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120423/


Fantafestival - WON - Best Film

Filmed at Glasgow, Strathclyde, Scotland, UK

Part Poltergeist and part Exorcist, this film from Scotland benefits from a strong cast and a juicy little drama.

Lizzie is a 12-year-old living with her mom and younger brother in a seedy Glasgow tenement. After a car accident Lizzie lies dead on the roadside. slowly, she is taken into the light, but is pulled back to earth when she is revived by the doctors. Lizzie feels sure that during the 184 seconds that she lay dead something latched on to her and came back into her world.


Video: XviD, 624x352, 25.000 fps, 776 Kbps, 01h24m48s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, 6 channel, 448 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
